note:
Connector Maven. Layout/Desktop Publishing Designer. Hoopy Frood. Binges on Birch Beer, Truffle Chips, and Worst Cooks.

Adult Congenital Heart Disease survivor, kicking Stage 3 IDC Breast Cancer in the dingding.

Former: Firefighter/Medic, Sous Chef, Waitress, Dishwasher, Big Oil Office Manager. Spent 30 years in F&B, 15 in Entertainment Marketing, and 35 in Graphic Design (concurrently, or I'm almost 90; The jury's deliberating).

Wannabe funny person - laughter and snark are my life's blood.
